description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Antigua, Antigua and Barbuda. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: All-Inclusive Adults-Only Beachfront Resort Overlooking Antigua's Long Bay
hotels.description: Brilliant white sands, rum-fuelled nights and mangrove forests bustling with majestic frigatebirds - these and more await with an all-inclusive, adults-only stay at Pineapple Beach Club Antigua. Set across 30 scenic beachfront acres, this tropical paradise is the perfect gateway to the vast treasures of the Caribbean. Snorkel through confectionary-bright reefs, sunbathe on warm sands or explore the island’s meticulously preserved historic landmarks. Dine across five onsite eateries, indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the onsite spa, kayak through turquoise waves or sip throughout your trip at five spectacular bars. Whatever you choose, you’ll be surrounded by breathtaking natural splendour and the gentle roar of the great blue beyond.

hotels.title: Private Caribbean Island All-Suite Indulgence with Beach Club, Garden Spa & Freshwater Pool
hotels.description: Leave the world behind for an all-inclusive escape surrounded by aquamarine waters on the sun-kissed island of Antigua. Ranked the 2024 #1 Hotel in Antigua on Tripadvisor, this five-star resort boasts a coveted location on the shores of Hermitage Bay Beach, surrounded by lush undeveloped land. Arriving here truly feels as though you’ve landed on your own private island. Comprised of 30 Caribbean-style suites freshly renovated in 2024, Hermitage Bay is the perfect destination to relax and re-energise your body and soul. The tranquil Garden Spa offers open-air treatments paired with a gentle breeze and the sound of lapping waves, while the buzzy Beach Club, decadent restaurant and laid-back Tree Bar are on hand for all-inclusive indulgence. From morning yoga to thrilling water sports, Hermitage Bay invites guests to be as active or chilled as they like. You might want to snorkel the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean, free your mind with complimentary meditation classes, or simply unwind by the freshwater pool and take in the beauty of Antigua with a drink in hand. You may never want to leave.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Adults-Only Antigua Villa Luxury Ranked Among the Caribbean's Best Hotels
hotels.description: Experience seamless opulence and five-star indulgence at the adults-only Hammock Cove Resort & Spa, Antigua. Overlooking the Caribbean’s Insta-worthy turquoise waters, and within a short walk of Devil’s Bridge National Park, this secluded haven defines the luxury resort experience through its three pillars - gastronomy, personalised service and uninterrupted luxury. Delivering impeccable indulgence amid a laidback tropical landscape, this amorous retreat was voted among the top 25 hotels for romance in the Caribbean and the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Embrace barefoot luxury on a series of untouched sandy beaches, take a dip in one of three cascading infinity pools or gaze out over the secluded bay before melting away with a treatment at Tranquility Spa. Sharpen your palate with bold, authentic flavours at Lighthouse Restaurant, serving specialty filet mignon and Caribbean lobster. For something more casual, Irina’s chic bistro-style vibe is perfect. Work your way through renowned wines at the Chairman’s Lounge, sip cocktails poolside at On The Rock or dabble in an authentic rum tasting at Nobody Knows. When you’re ready to retire for the night, your ultra-modern, spacious private villa awaits - one of only 40 onsite, each with its own infinity-edge plunge pool, island-inspired furnishings and dreamy vistas.
